CVS ROW SRR 4CR 55 SSE SAF 25 SSW RTN 35 SSE RTN 40 ENE LVS 45 NW
TCC TCC CVS 55 SSW CVS.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 45 ESE MTC 10 SW IND
